title: Tension inside the Jumbo-Visma bus? Wout van Aert denies rumors of discord with Jonas Vingegaard
content:
Van Aert says hints of tension in the Netflix documentary does not reflect reality: 'The criticism should not be there. The atmosphere is great.'

Read the full article at Tension inside the Jumbo-Visma bus? Wout van Aert denies rumors of discord with Jonas Vingegaard on Velo.
author: ahood
